REI is one of my favorite websites because I love outdoor gear. They even have a portion of their cite, where you can purchase used goods and they are a lot more affordable that way. They are generally in excellent condition as well.

AllTrails is also one of my favorite websites. It is the cite I utilize to find hiking and backpacking trails.

Finally, Amazon is one of my favorite sites as well just because of all the general shopping that I do on there.
